statements: DELETE FROM software_tools WHERE researcher_id IN (SELECT researcher_id FROM researchers WHERE department = 'Computer Science')
DELETE FROM research_workflows WHERE workflow_name = 'Example Workflow';
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University A';
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE field_of_study = 'Data Science';
DELETE FROM ResearcherTools WHERE researcher_id = 1 AND tool_id = 2;
DELETE FROM ResearcherTools WHERE researcher_id = 1 AND tool_id = 3;
DELETE FROM tool_workflow_mapping WHERE tool_id = 2 AND workflow_id = 3;
